attributes.action: Stop Selling Halal In The UK
attributes.additional_details:
Subway food chain is just one of many that serves customers halal, the evidence is actually written on their very own website. 

Millfield School in Somerset is just one of many schools within the UK that has a halal menu.

ASDA supermarket chain openly advertises/sells Halal in their stores
attributes.background:
Animals are slaughtered and suffer a slow painful death unnecessarily to serve halal meat in food chains/supermarkets and even in schools here. 
Animal cruelty is not acceptable in the UK so why are we allowing this?
